https://tmrev.io/movie/22025-Detroit Metal City 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yDFAlS4KQsNBH7nRR2ktI5ADa5z.jpg Soichi Negishi moved to Tokyo to chase his dream of becoming a musician playing stylish, Swedish-style pop. Instead, he finds himself leading the death metal band Detroit Metal City, or DMC, as the costumed and grotesquely made-up "demon emperor" Johannes Krauser II. Although he hates the role and the things he has to do as a member of the band, he has a definite talent for it. Detroit Metal City
